channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Kill Switch’—Iran Shuts Down Musk’s Starlink For First Time
item.description: No way out — Iran's blackout just got worse.

item.title: Global central bank leaders back Fed Chair Powell amid federal investigation
item.description: Global central bank leaders rallied behind Fed Chair Jerome Powell as he faces criminal investigation from Trump administration over perjury allegatio...

item.title: Trump's proposed credit card interest rate cap could curb access for millions of Americans: report
item.description: President Trump's proposed 10% credit card interest rate cap could eliminate access for 175 million to 190 million cardholders, with lower and middle ...

item.title: Delta sees wealthy high fliers leading to another record year—but its CEO sees the main cabin ‘struggling greatly’
item.description: Investors are glum about tariffs taking a bite out of Delta's guidance, sending shares down 3% as the carrier capped a banner year.

item.title: Why the $38 trillion national debt doomed Fed independence regardless of the Trump/Powell drama, top economist says
item.description: “The reason markets didn’t react more is because we already wrecked the independence of the Fed,” said Tyler Cowen, economist and blogger extraordinai...

item.title: As ‘agentic commerce’ gains ground, companies shouldn’t put too much faith in ‘GEO,’ one industry insider warns
item.description: Research from AIVO Standard shows that AI models are inconsistent and unreliable in answering questions about a company's finances or governance stand...

item.title: Scott Adams, Dilbert creator who went from cubicle wars to culture wars, posts open letter to time with his death at 68
item.description: "If you are reading this, things did not go well for me," Adams' X account said on Jan. 13. The cartoonist had documented his illness for many months.

item.title: A New Anaconda, Old Pollution, And The Amazon’s Warning Signs
item.description: Pole to Pole’s Amazon episodes document a new anaconda species and reveal how pollution moves through one of Earth’s most complex ecosystems.

item.title: Apple’s Subtle iPhone Upgrade Rule Makes Updating Now The Smart Move
item.description: A quiet change of direction from Apple means users deciding when or whether to update to iOS 26 may want to act quickly.

item.title: Risa Labs Raises $11.1 Million To Scale AI Operating System For Oncology Workflows
item.description: AI startup RISA Labs raises $11.1M Series A to scale its AI operating system for oncology, cutting authorization delays, reducing denials, and speedin...

item.title: How Crew-11 Is Spending Its Final Days On The ISS Before Medical Departure
item.description: Ahead of an unprecedented early exit from the International Space Station due to an undisclosed medical concern, Crew-11 astronauts continue their sci...

item.title: Inflation held steady in December, remaining well above the Fed's 2% target
item.description: The Bureau of Labor Statistics released CPI inflation data which showed that consumer prices rose at a steady pace in December as inflation remained w...

item.title: Despite his $2.6 billion net worth, MrBeast says he’s having to borrow cash and doesn’t even have enough money in his bank account to buy McDonald’s
item.description: Jimmy Donaldson, the world’s most popular YouTuber and founder of $5 billion business Beast Industries, claims he doesn’t “technically” have enough mo...

item.title: Some 830,000 Americans appear to be opting out of ‘Obamacare’ as subsidies end
Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq all lower in final hour as financial stocks slump — live
Exxon Mobil’s stock hits a new high. Its CEO’s call on Venezuela may be helping.
Trump’s War Department invests $1 billion into this rocket-motor maker
This Google-backed space stock is up 600% in a year. The climb could continue.
Former Fed chairs, Treasury secretaries defend Jerome Powell amid Trump DOJ's criminal probe
item.description: A group of former Federal Reserve chairs and ex-Treasury secretaries from both administrations of both parties is defending Fed Chair Jerome Powell am...

item.title: Trump to interview BlackRock's Rick Rieder for Fed chair role
item.description: President Donald Trump will interview BlackRock's Rick Rieder on Thursday for the role of Federal Reserve chairman, sources tell FOX Business.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
